section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Abdullah b. Abu Mulaika reported that Abdullah b. Jafar said to Ibn Zubair:Do you remember (the occasion) when we three (i. e. I, you and lbn 'Abbas) met Allah's Messenger (ï·º) and he mounted us (on his camel) but left you? He said: Yes
